explains: n. [妇产] 流产；失败；误送
wordGroup: miscarriage of justice 误判；审判不公

sentences.en: The pregnancy ended in miscarriage at 11 weeks.
I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
sentences.cn: 在大约第16至18周时我又一次自然流产了。

sentences.en: I can imagine no greater miscarriage of justice than the execution of an innocent man.
sentences.cn: 我想象不出比处死无辜的人更严重的误判了。
